name: Tethered (itch) (baron_elmwich)
description:
Here today, gone tomorrow! As a fresh ghost, finish your remaining chores on Earth to pass on to the Great Beyond!

I made this for the "Gamedev.tv Game Jam 2022" game jam in about 10 days. 

https://itch.io/jam/gamedevtv-jam-2022

The game jam theme was: Death Is Only The Beginning.

### CONTROLS ###

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Space bar to jump

E to interact with objects, interacting with all objects opens portal to next level

### CREDITS ###

Thank you Gamedev.tv for hosting the Jam and creating a great game dev community!

This game was created with Unity, and the images were created with Aseprite.

Big thank you to the creators of the sound effects and music, which are listed below:

Gates of Heaven Music by TheoTer: https://freesound.org/people/TheoTer/sounds/511195/

Choir of Voices - Single Chord by bone666138: https://freesound.org/people/bone666138/sounds/274121/

Phased Tubular Bell by ani_music: https://freesound.org/people/ani_music/sounds/209988/

Idle Chambers - Silver Lining by Bobjt: https://opengameart.org/content/idle-chambers (Bobjt - http://bobjt.com)

And lastly the great Kenny Audio Assets (https://kenney.nl/)
